name: Harbinger of Dawn

refinement_effect.refine_one: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 14%.
refinement_effect.refine_two: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 17.5%.
refinement_effect.refine_three: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 21%.
refinement_effect.refine_four: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 24.5%.
refinement_effect.refine_five: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 28%.

description: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a 'feel-good' buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.
